mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BORROW JOIN BOOK USING(BOOK_NO) WHERE RETURN_DT IS NOT NULL AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_REQUEST WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAY WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT BOOK_NO, BOOK_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BORROW_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BORROW_DT, TO_CHAR(RETURN_DUE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RETURN_DUE_DT, CASE WHEN RETURN_DUE_DT < SYSDATE THEN 'O' ELSE 'N' END STATUS FROM BORROW JOIN BOOK USING(BOOK_NO) WHERE RETURN_DT IS NULL AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT BOOK_NO, BOOK_TITLE, TO_CHAR(BORROW_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BORROW_DT, TO_CHAR(RETURN_DUE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RETURN_DUE_DT, TO_CHAR(RETURN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RETURN_DT, CASE WHEN TRUNC(RETURN_DT) > TRUNC(RETURN_DUE_DT) THEN 'O' ELSE 'N' END STATUS FROM BORROW JOIN BOOK USING(BOOK_NO) WHERE RETURN_DT IS NOT NULL AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, BOOK_NO, BOOK_TITLE, MEMBER_NO, TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RESERVATION_DT, TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_DT + 2, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RESERVATION_DT_E FROM B_RESERVATION JOIN BOOK USING(BOOK_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND SYSDATE < RESERVATION_DT + 2 ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, SEAT_NO, TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RESERVATION_DT, TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'HH24:MI') START_TIME, TO_CHAR(END_TIME, 'HH24:MI') END_TIME FROM RESERVATION_PLACE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND SEAT_NO IS NOT NULL AND SYSDATE < END_TIME

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, TO_CHAR(RESERVATION_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RESERVATION_DT, TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'HH24:MI') START_TIME, TO_CHAR(END_TIME, 'HH24:MI') END_TIME FROM RESERVATION_PLACE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND SEAT_NO IS NULL AND SYSDATE < END_TIME

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') START_DT, TO_CHAR(END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DT, TO_CHAR(RECRUITMENT_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RECRUITMENT_START_DT, TO_CHAR(RECRUITMENT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RECRUITMENT_END_DT FROM CLASS_PEOPLE C JOIN CLASS_SCHEDULE USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN BOARD USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE C.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND SYSDATE < RECRUITMENT_END_DT
SELECT FOOD_NAME, FOOD_QTY, TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') PAY_DATE, FOOD_PRICE * FOOD_QTY FOOD_PRICE FROM PAY JOIN FOOD USING(FOOD_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT BOOK_NO, BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_AUTHOR, BOOK_PUB, BOOK_PUB_DT, BOOK_ISBN FROM BOOK_LIKE JOIN BOOK USING(BOOK_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
